message: I'll take 6000 and give you 4000. It's a fair deal, considering inflation will hit me harder than you.
Considering the inflation, I'll take a bit more, but still a good deal for you!
I'm willing to compromise. 5500 for me, 4500 for you.  It's a better deal than the last round and helps us both avoid further losses from inflation.
Inflation is hitting you hard, Bob. This is a good deal for you before it gets worse!
